articles.description: Members of the newspaper's union say they have been warned the company could cut as many as 300 jobs, although no announcement has been made.

articles.title: Eli Lilly plans $3.5 billion manufacturing plant in Pennsylvania to make next-generation obesity injections - CNBC
articles.description: The plant will help make Lilly's experimental drug called retatrutide, which has shown the highest weight loss seen to date in a late-stage trial.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tesla throws in the towel on car sales - The Verge
articles.description: Is Tesla still a car company? Elon Musk is pushing AI, robots, and robotaxis, but the bulk of the company’s revenues still come from car sales. How much longer will that last?

articles.author: Alex Kozul-Wright
articles.title: Gold and Silver Prices Fall Sharply as Trump Picks Warsh as Fed Chair. Here’s Why. - Barron's
articles.content: Gold tumbled early Friday as markets reacted to the news that President Donald Trump has selected Kevin Warsh to replace Jerome Powell as head of the Federal Reserve.
